content.text: Match ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 4, Konyaspor 0.
Second Half ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 4, Konyaspor 0.
Attempt missed. Dentinho (Shakhtar Donetsk) right footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Darijo Srna.
Offside, Konyaspor. Abdulkerim Bardakci tries a through ball, but Rijad Bajic is caught offside.
Halil Ibrahim Sonmez (Konyaspor) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ivan Ordets (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Taras Stepanenko (Shakhtar Donetsk) is shown the yellow card.

Goal!  Shakhtar Donetsk 3, Konyaspor 0. Eduardo da Silva (Shakhtar Donetsk) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Darijo Srna with a cross following a set piece situation.
